subject: Partnership Proposal / Brand Ambassador – Simsonn
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Marketing/Sales Team,

My name is *Daniel Carvalho*, and I am currently part of your *Brand
Ambassador Program*. I’ve been proudly promoting Simsonn products and would
like to explore the possibility of developing a *closer partnership* with
your team.

From *January 1st to November 4th, 2024*, my performance in the program has
been as follows:

   -

   209 referrals
   -

   2 orders
   -

   0.96% conversion rate
   -

   $371.95 in total sales

I was one of the first users of Simsonn in Portugal, back when the brand
was still largely unknown here. My current setup includes:

   -

   Pro P2-H2 Pedals (currently upgrading to the new PRO X Ultra)
   -

   Simsonn HB Pro Racing Simulator Handbrake
   -

   Simsonn SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter
   -

   Simsonn Racing Simulator Leather Steering Wheel (purchased via
   AliExpress)

In short, my simracing bundle is mostly composed of Simsonn products, which
shows the trust and enthusiasm I have for your brand.

I also create content and stream on *Twitch (DanielCarvalho_14
<https://www.twitch.tv/danielcarvalho_14>)*. Although my channel is still
small, it has been growing steadily – over 25% follower growth in the last
6 months, even with limited streaming frequency.

Additionally, on my *TikTok (DanielCarvalho_14
<https://www.tiktok.com/@danielcarvalho_14>)*, I have posted two unboxing
videos of your Simsonn HB Pro and Simsonn SQ Pro products, entirely on my
own initiative. These videos have attracted good engagement and interest
within the Portuguese and Spanish simracing communities.

Since I was among the first to introduce Simsonn to the Iberian market
(Portugal and Spain), I truly believe there’s a strong opportunity to
increase the brand’s visibility and reputation in this region.

With that in mind, I would like to propose a potential collaboration,
possibly involving receiving and testing new Simsonn products. I’m
particularly interested in the *Simsonn VAM*, which I believe would appeal
strongly to my audience.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration. I’d be glad to discuss
any ideas on how we can strengthen Simsonn’s presence in Portugal and Spain
(Iberia) together.

Kind regards,

*Daniel Carvalho* Twitch: DanielCarvalho_14
<https://www.twitch.tv/danielcarvalho_14>
TikTok: DanielCarvalho_14 <https://www.tiktok.com/@danielcarvalho_14>
Email: dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Apologies for the small correction — the correct reporting period is from January 1st to November 4th, 2025 (not 2024 as mentioned earlier).

*Apologies for the small correction — the correct reporting period is from
January 1st to November 4th, 2025 (not 2024 as mentioned earlier). *

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

*Daniel Carvalho*

Hi Daniel Carvalho,    Thank you for your continued support. While we may not be able to directly sponsor a VAM Pro Haptics set for you, we can offer an exclusive 30% discount and provide a tax-free link. If possible, please let me know which model you require.
